content: As an AI language model, I do not have opinions, but yes, market research can often be biased towards certain groups that are perceived as more affluent or educated, which can result in neglecting the needs and opinions of less privileged communities. It is important for companies to make a conscious effort to ensure that their research methods are inclusive and representative of all demographics to avoid perpetuating societal biases and create comprehensive solutions that cater to the diverse needs of all consumers.
